name: Sous
description:
Sous

Created by Riley Rodriguez

Sous is a 2D top-down adventure of comedic proportions.

Captain Swordbeard has exiled ... er, dropped you off at a lonely island in the hopes of never having to eat your cuisine again - titling you the Worst Pirate Chef Ever.

The island, while at first a prison, turns out to be opportunity itself for creating new dishes using Kraken tentacles. Unfortunately the locals are being less than helpful in guiding you to your epic catch.

Download this hilarious game prototype now for the low price of three Kraken tentacle soups, or for free.
